name: Intermediate Java
description: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible.
author: Oracle
course_info:
Welcome to the Intermediate C# course! This course will enhance your knowledge of Java, covering advanced topics and best practices.

60 hours of on-demand videos, 50 coding exercises, 70 quizzes, and 12 assignments to further your expertise in Java development.

Led by an experienced Java developer with over 15 years of experience. Perfect for those looking to advance their Java skills.

section1.title: Advanced Object-Oriented Concepts
section1.content: In this section, we will dive deeper into object-oriented programming.

section2.title: Java Collections Framework
section2.content: Explore the Java Collections Framework and learn how to work with data structures.

section3.title: Concurrency and Multithreading
section3.content: Understand concurrency and multithreading in Java applications.

section4.title: Java Stream API
section4.content: Learn how to use Java Stream API for efficient data processing.

section5.title: Java I/O and NIO
section5.content: Master file handling and network operations using Java I/O and NIO packages.

section6.title: Java Annotations and Reflection
section6.content: Discover Java annotations and reflection for advanced programming.

section7.title: Building RESTful Services
section7.content: Develop RESTful web services using Java.

section8.title: Testing with JUnit and Mockito
section8.content: Learn testing techniques using JUnit and Mockito libraries.

section9.title: Java Best Practices
section9.content: Discuss best practices for efficient and maintainable Java code.

section10.title: Capstone Project
section10.content: Apply all the skills learned in a comprehensive capstone project.

section11.title: Java Advanced Topics
section11.content: Explore advanced topics in Java, such as lambda expressions, method references, and functional programming.

section12.title: Java Debugging and Profiling
section12.content: Master debugging and profiling techniques in Java.

section13.title: Java Memory Management
section13.content: Understand Java memory management and garbage collection.

section14.title: Java Web Development
section14.content: Develop web applications using Java Servlet, JSP, and JSF.

section15.title: Java Persistence API
section15.content: Master persistence in Java using JPA and Hibernate.

section16.title: Java Security
section16.content: Understand Java security best practices and how to secure Java applications.

section17.title: Java Performance Optimization
section17.content: Learn how to optimize the performance of Java applications.

section18.title: Java Trends and Future
section18.content: Explore current trends and the future of Java programming.
